0.name: Untrained
0.description: A civilian with no special training or powers. The baseline for an ordinary person.

1.name: Beginner
1.description: Just starting out on their journey. Has potential but lacks significant experience.

2.name: Novice
2.description: Has learned the basics and can handle minor threats.

3.name: Developing
3.description: Actively gaining experience and developing their core abilities.

4.name: Competent
4.description: A reliable and capable individual. This is the standard starting tier for player characters.

5.name: Professional
5.description: A seasoned individual with a solid reputation and a professional level of skill.

6.name: Expert
6.description: Highly skilled and recognized as an authority in their field.

7.name: Veteran
7.description: Has seen extensive action and has a wealth of practical experience.

8.name: Elite
8.description: Among the best in the world, operating at the highest levels of performance.

9.name: Master
9.description: Has achieved a state of mastery that pushes the boundaries of their abilities.

10.name: Legendary
10.description: A figure of legend whose deeds and power are known far and wide.
